#summary Listing of all model initialization methods.
#labels chapter,1.0

These methods are called from the `init` function of your model files.

==Example==

`models/Author.cfc`:

{{{
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset hasMany("posts")>
</cffunction>
}}}
